recommendations: Balkrishna Prabhu
Program Manager, IT Services - Projects & Operations
April 5, 2015, Char was a client of Balkrishna’s

It is a privilege of mine to write this recommendation for Char.  I have had the pleasure of knowing her for about 4 years now. Char comes across as an outstanding and passionate IT Leader - someone that you can count on to deliver challenging and complex projects within tight deadlines/budgetary constraints and at the same time manage steady state objectives with impeccable persistence and tenacity.While I worked with her she spearheaded some turnkey IT component discovery and automation projects for Kaiser in the Configuration & Asset (SACM) management space that would render a lot of maturity to the different service transition and operation processes dependent on SACM.Char is a visionary leader and a team player that any IT delivery organization can count on to turn around any tough situation and has the knack of bringing out the best in people that she works with. I wish her the very best in her endeavors..

Tylor Hagerman
Senior Product Manager
January 25, 2010, Tylor reported directly to Char

Char is a truly amazing manager.  She has mastered the ability to deeply connect with and support her direct reports, while at the same time motivate her team to produce high quality, on-time results.  Your direct manager has a huge influence on your overall work experience and engagement as an employee.  Char's leadership style is so effective in this area that her team consistently rated their work engagement levels higher than employees reporting to other managers in our area.  I can't recommend her highly enough!

Terry Angulo
Senior Staff, Technology Infrastructure Services at Charles Schwab
January 19, 2010, Terry reported directly to Char

It is my pleasure to recommend Char Levitt, as she ranks high on my list of fair, caring and honest business professionals.  When I arrived at Schwab, I had to “hit the ground running” and quickly figure out a number of inter-related components: the company, the technology, historical artifacts, etc...  Thankfully, Char served as my Leader (beacon and compass) and provided me with exemplary guidance and direction.  Not only did she listen, she allowed me to explore new options and provided the forthright feedback to ensure that I didn’t stray too far off path or make a mistake.  Char’s ability to understand "the big picture" coupled with her ability to quickly grasp the technical concepts is impressive.  She is an excellent communicator with awesome “people skills”, and has a knack for handling difficult situations with dignity and tact.  I am confident that all who have worked with her would consider her an excellent co-worker and friend.
Terry Angulo

Kris was a respected professional manager at IBM. He was effective at maturing the services agreement at Kaiser Permanente, helping to build strong business relationships which were instrumental to his success as a Service Delivery Manager. Kris is an excellent manager; making use of limited resources and focusing on the results required to satisfy management and to build his organization's capabilities. Kris demonstrated leadership and effective communication in the management meetings we attended together. As a business partner, I always enjoyed working with Kris - the efforts were effective, the communication to the point and the accomplishments something we are both proud of.

Christina Lawrence
I figure things out, I get things done, and I play well with others.
April 4, 2015, Char reported directly to Christina

Christina Lawrence is an exceptional business leader. While at Kaiser Permanente, she established a solid track record for implementing key IT strategic goals, building highly successful teams, and managing an array of enterprise critical systems. I was fortunate to report directly to Christina and was influenced by her strong business acumen, strategic agility, and a passion for continuous learning. She has a reputation at Kaiser for being intelligent, focused, and a continuous positive force, especially on complex projects that stretched across the organization. Christina is also a delight to work with, making her staff and colleagues feel that it is a pleasure to be at work each day.
